content.html:
In June, The Markup reported that Meta Pixels on the websites of 33 of Newsweek‚Äôs top 100 hospitals in America were transmitting the details of patients‚Äô doctor‚Äôs appointments to Meta when patients booked on the websites. We also found Meta Pixels inside the password-protected patient portals of seven health systems collecting data about patients‚Äô prescriptions, sexual orientation, and health conditions.

So of course 3 months later ‚Ä¶

Meta Faces Mounting Questions from Congress on Health Data Privacy As Hospitals Remove Facebook Tracker

Who are the people inside Meta that thinks this a good idea, then makes it happen and fails to tell anyone?

content.html:
Secret life of Gerald: the New Zealand MP who spent a lifetime crafting a vast imaginary world

Not even Gerald O‚ÄôBrien‚Äôs wife of 60 years knew of the countless hours he spent drawing and writing stories of his parallel world.

These are the kinds of secrets I would like more people to have. Such a welcome change to the usual. What an extraordinary man.

‚ÄúI talked to him for a year ‚Ä¶ about all sorts of things, but the imaginary world never came up and it pisses me off that I didn‚Äôt know,‚Äù

üí¨ Lucien Rizos - his nephew
